participant_1.background:
I'm going to see my brother this weekend to take my mind off my wife.
my family came from greece in the 1950 s.
I live off the land and I'm content with my simple life.
My garden is my most prized possession.
i love to play league of legends.

participant_2.background:
I'm looking for a home with a large closet so I can have plenty of space for my sewing supplies.
My worst moment was losing a patient in my arms.
I do not like to talk about my personal life.
i am trying to write an ebook on animals.
I remember playing with my cat in the backyard all day long.

content.text: Hey there! What are you up to today?
I'm working on a new project, it's an ebook about animals.
That sounds like fun! What kind of animals are you writing about?
I'm writing about all different kinds of animals, from mammals to reptiles to insects.
That's really cool! I've always been interested in animals.
Me too! They're just so fascinating.
What's your favorite animal?
That's a tough question, but I think I'd have to say cats.
Cats are great! I have two of them myself.
I love cats! They're so independent and cuddly.
Yeah, they're the best.
What are your hobbies?
I love to play video games and garden.
I love to garden too! I'm always looking for new plants to add to my garden.
What kind of plants do you have?
I have a lot of different kinds of plants, but my favorite are my roses.
Roses are beautiful! I love the smell of them.
Me too! They're such a beautiful flower.
Well, it was nice talking to you. I'm going to go play some video games now.
Okay, have fun! I'm going to keep working on my ebook.
